name: places/ChIJJ2oiVShZwokR0xU9Vupty3A
formattedAddress: 405 E 51st St #5h, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 405 E 51st St #5h, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text:
I had the pleasure of working with Andrew at Atlantic GMAT for well over a year as I prepared for the quantitative reasoning section of the GRE. Andrew’s teaching strategy utilizes practice problems/quizzes based on questions from both the GRE and GMAT. By flagging questions ahead of each session, Andrew took a methodical approach to targeting my personal weak spots. Thanks to our tutoring sessions and extensive practicing of problem sets from Atlantic GMAT and Magoosh, I raised my GRE quant score by 12 points!

I give immense credit to Andrew for understanding my learning style and customizing his instruction accordingly. For example, we dedicated an entire tutoring session in which we painstakingly went through various permutations of combinatorics problems to build up my understanding of the topic. Andrew’s emotional intelligence and boundless patience make learning from him enjoyable and effective.

On top of his top-notch tutoring skills, Andrew is responsive via email and flexible when scheduling. Billing through Atlantic GMAT was fair and transparent. My only pieces of constructive feedback are that the Google Sheets homework tracking system takes some getting used to, and occasional typos in practice problems resulted in some headaches. But these issues pale in comparison to my phenomenal experience. I rate my tutoring experience with Andrew a perfect 10 and wholeheartedly recommend him and Atlantic GMAT to any student preparing for the GRE or GMAT.

originalText.text:
Everything in the reviews about tailored schedule, helpful homework and excellent material are all true. The schedule in particular is a great offering from Atlantic and is entirely personalized to your needs/what you need to work on.

The experience with Atlantic, however, goes much farther than that; Andrew is an incredibly patient, encouraging, and helpful tutor. With a daunting task like the GMAT, it is important to find the right people to help, and Atlantic is just that. Andrew stayed accessible and supportive throughout my five (!!) attempts, offering guidance beyond tutoring sessions and was instrumental in my improvements.

I could not have wished for a better experience - Atlantic really goes well above and beyond.

originalText.text: Andrew was a great tutor - incredibly patient and kind. His daily study guides were invaluable to my GMAT studying and really pushed me to nail questions on test day. My score improved significantly as a result of Andrew's tutoring. I would definitely recommend Atlantic GMAT!

text.text: Andrew was a great tutor - incredibly patient and kind. His daily study guides were invaluable to my GMAT studying and really pushed me to nail questions on test day. My score improved significantly as a result of Andrew's tutoring. I would definitely recommend Atlantic GMAT!

originalText.text: I can't speak more highly of Andrew and my tutoring experience with Atlantic GMAT. The experience was highly tailored and our focus on material/schedule of homework was recalibrated whenever certain areas needed a bit more emphasis. I highly recommend Atlantic GMAT, particularly for those who are working full time, as Andrew and his team work closely with students to maximize learning while considering other commitments. Thank you Andrew and Atlantic GMAT for helping me achieve my goal and improving my GMAT score by 200 points!

originalText.text: If anyone is looking to boost their GMAT score, I highly recommend Atlantic GMAT Tutoring, especially with Luciano. With Luciano's guidance, I was able to increase by score by 100 points and have a score that started with a 7. He put together a homework plan tailored to my needs and provided test-taking strategies that helped on the day of the exam. It was everything I needed to hit my GMAT goal.
